bibl.title: Papyrology = YCS 28 (1985).
bibl.note: With a Preface (pp. ix-x) by Naphtali Lewis. This volume celebrates the centenary of papyrology as a classical discipline.
bibl.seg: Cambridge, University Press, 1985, 8°, x-293 pp., VIII pll.
With a Preface (pp. ix-x) by Naphtali Lewis. This volume celebrates the centenary of papyrology as a classical discipline.

C.R. par Carla Balconi, Aegyptus 66 (1986) pp. 284-286. - Geneviève Husson, REG 99 (1986) pp. 196-198. - François Lasserre, MusHelv 43 (1986) p. 273. - Jean A. Straus, EtCl 54 (1986) p. 328. - Alain Martin, AntCl 56 (1987) pp. 439-440. - Claude Orrieux, BibO 45 (1988) coll. 137-139 (concerne aussi, Naphtali Lewis, Greeks in Ptolemaic Egypt. Oxford, 1986). - Revel Coles, JEA 75 (1989) pp. 289-290. - Joachim Hengstl, HZ 246 (1988) pp. 121-122. - Jean Bingen, ChrEg 64 (1989) Nos 127-128, pp. 341-346. - Alain Blanchard, REL 67 (1989) p. 389. - Antonio López García, Faventia 10 (1988) pp. 202-204.
